Function rebin

boost::histogram::algorithm::rebin — Rebin option to be used in reduce().

Synopsis

// In header: <boost/histogram/algorithm/reduce.hpp>


reduce_option rebin(unsigned iaxis, unsigned merge);

Description

Parameters:

iaxis

which axis to operate on.

merge

how many adjacent bins to merge into one.
